data.text: Abiro miyo Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ kinde duto;
Chunya biro sungore kuom Jehova Nyasaye,
Miuru Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ kaachiel koda;
Ne amanyo Jehova Nyasaye ka alamo, kendo nodwoka;
Joma oketo genogi kuome rieny;
Ngʼat ma odhierni noluongo Jehova Nyasaye,
Malaika mar Jehova Nyasaye oumo alwora mar jogo momiye luor
Bi mondo ine ni Jehova Nyasaye ber;
Luoruru Jehova Nyasaye, un joge maler,
Sibuoche nyalo ool kendo kech nyalo kayogi,
Biuru nyithinda kendo winjauru.
Ngʼato angʼata kuomu mohero ngima
nyaka ogengʼ lewe kik wuo marach
Lokri iwe timbe maricho kendo itim tim maber;
Wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye ni kuom joma kare
to Jehova Nyasaye mon gi joma timo gik maricho,
Joma kare koywak to Jehova Nyasaye winjogi;
Jehova Nyasaye chiegni gi joma chunygi otur
Ngʼat makare nyalo bedo gi chandruok mangʼeny,
orito chokene duto,
Timbe maricho biro nego ngʼama timbene rach,
Jehova Nyasaye reso jotichne;
